descriptionHtml:
So I am back to modding.. and by modding I mean sculpting virtual boobs (what am I doing with my life?) 

I made the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86182/?]Babe Body[/url] a while back and it was pretty nice. But not nice enough! I wanted a thicc body that not even the pope could resist staring at in pure admiration. Ladies and Gents (mostly gents, aye?) I present to you.. the Extra Thiicc body preset!

No - I am not a basement dweller.


[b][u][size=4][color=#e06666]WARNING: this preset is not realistic or lore friendly in any way
[/color]
[/size][/u][/b]
[u][b][size=4]Now before you can use this,
there are a few things you'll need:[/size][/b][/u]
(1) [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]
(2) [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32731/?]Caliente's Bodyslide[/url] with UUNP options from the installation.
(3) A UNP based skin texture. I recommend [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]!
(4) [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum skeleton Extended[/url] for the skeleton
(5) [url=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ea/Sobo_1909_624.png/326px-Sobo_1909_624.png]A decent brain[/url] to get through the installation instructions. 

[b][u][size=4]Now to get this show on the road, here are the instructions to install the mod.
 It's quite simple, really![/size][/u][/b]
(1) XP32 Skeleton overwrites everything.
(2) Bodyslide Overwrites HDT physics (but not XP32).
(3) Download and Extract my File.
[size=2](4) Go to Skyrim>>Data>>CalienteTools>>BodySlide>>SliderPresets>>(put the file in here!)[/size]
[size=2](5) Start BodySlide program, select this body from among the UUNP hdt presets, batch build, done![/size]

[b][u][size=4]Now, if you value my opinion at all...
I'd love to recommend some mods to ya![/size][/u][/b]
[size=2](1) [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url][size=2] - better animations.[/size]
[size=2](2) [/size][url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/high-poly-feet-and-hands-for-unp-bodies/]Halo's High Poly Feet and Hands[/url][size=2] - cause vanilla hands are nasty.[/size]
[size=2](3) [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85199/?]Amelia Rose Racemenu Preset[/url][size=2] (my mod) cause it's absolutely beautiful![/size]
[size=2](4) [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50501/?]Grim and Somber Azura ENB[/url][size=2] - very pure light, great for screenshots in buildings that have fireplaces![/size]
[size=2](5) Lifelike Idle Animation[/size][size=2] - so you don't look stupid when you're idle.[/size]
[size=2](6) [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77343/?]Realistic Animation Project[/url][size=2] - this mod makes your moving animations a lot better.[/size]
[size=2](7) [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78593/?]Her Animations[/url][size=2] - Get the jumping animation 1.
(8) [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85411/?]UUNP Vanilla Outfits Bodyslides[/url] - all the vanilla outfits converted to UUNP. Robton makes a good vanilla armor replacer too, be sure to check that out!

[/size][u][b][size=4]If you're looking for UUNP outfit conversions,
then there are a few place you can check![/size][/b][/u]
(1) TESmistel's tumblr
(2) wtfuun's "Skyrim Shitty UUNP HDT" tumblr
(3) JR's Conversions and Malfdawg's Conversions on the site that shall not be named...
(4) [url=https://skyrimscandal.blogspot.com/?zx=54d274edfde3d59f]Skyrim Scandal[/url] - this is your best source for high quality conversions!
(5) UUNP Skimpy Immersive Armos mashup (on the site that shall not be named) is an amazing mod if you have [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armors[/url] and want to have some extremely disfunctional armor.
author: wnisewond
